Name: Sushi House

Review Text: Quite authentic Japanese cuisine. The way it is managed and kept gives a very satisfactory feeling of clean and hygienic restaurant. No place to eat there, just take away or deliveries. You'll enjoy for sure. for more experiences like this, follow @quiquinnv
